biweekly.util

Class ByDay

  • java.lang.Object
    • biweekly.util.ByDay

  • public class ByDay
extends Object

    Represents a specific day or all days in a month or year.

    Examples:

    • new ByDay(3, DayOfWeek.MONDAY) - The third Monday in the month/year.
    • new ByDay(-1, DayOfWeek.MONDAY) - The last Monday in the month/year.
    • new ByDay(DayOfWeek.MONDAY) - Every Monday in the month/year.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt

      Constructors
